channel.title: Magic dosnt kill npc
channel.description: is there anything i can add to make magic hurt npc at the moment it says its hitting them but it never kills what would i have to search for or add to make it actually kill them thanks

item.title: Magic dosnt kill npc
item.dc:creator: @Enyo Enyo
item.description:
@Enyo wrote:

where should i edit the magic skills in client or magichandler

Read full topic

item.title: Magic dosnt kill npc
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

In packet 131, I believe you need to have the subtraction of their HP defined… Hold on.

EDIT: Try this after all your spells

server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].updateRequired = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitUpdateRequired = true;

If that doesn’t work,

server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff = hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
Might need all four.

Read full topic
